summary: Production Smoke Test COMPLETED - Full regression testing of Verified Sound A&R application. All major features tested and working correctly. Public pages, authentication, authenticated user flows, AI chatbox, admin dashboard, and API health all passed.

issues: Tier value shows 'TierTier I' with redundant 'Tier' label - data-testid includes label text

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero, navigation, feature cards, CTA buttons, AI chatbox button
Pricing page shows all 3 tiers with correct prices ($39/$89/$139 monthly, $390/$890/$1,390 annual)
CTA buttons redirect to login when not authenticated
Login page loads with email/password inputs and submit button
Logout works and redirects to login page
Dashboard displays subscription tier (Tier I), status (Inactive), renews, monthly cap
Dashboard shows 'No active subscription' banner with 'View plans' button
Dashboard feature access grid shows tier comparison
Press images section visible on dashboard
EPK settings section visible on dashboard
Settings page loads with profile form (artist name, contact email, genre, location, bio)
Settings page shows social links section
Media page loads with press image manager (shows 1/3 images uploaded)
Media page shows 'Add Image' and 'Refresh' buttons
EPK Preview page loads with user data (Test Artist, Bio, Press Images)
Floating chat button visible on all pages
Click opens chat panel with greeting message
Chat accepts user input and sends messages
AI responds with relevant information about services
Admin overview page loads with stats (Total Submissions, Pending Review, Paid Payments, Email Failures, Total Users)
Admin tabs visible: Overview, Submissions, Payments, Emails, Users, Analytics
POST /api/chat-assistant returns 200 (works without auth for public use)
critical_code_review_comments: All core features working as expected
API endpoints correctly return 401 for unauthenticated requests
AI chatbox integration with Google AI API working
Admin dashboard accessible to admin users with stats
Minor: Dashboard tier/status cards show redundant label text in data-testid value extraction

test_credentials.note: This user has onboardingCompleted=true and is an admin user

context_for_next_testing_agent: Full smoke test completed successfully. All checklist items tested where possible. Test user verifiedsoundmedia@gmail.com is both a regular user AND an admin user. User has 1/3 press images uploaded. Stripe checkout, actual email sending, and public EPK slug pages could not be fully tested due to external service dependencies (Stripe API, Postmark). AI chatbox works with Google AI integration.
